entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to a few rain showers and flurries this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
